recipe.name: Fall Salad with Cranberry Vinaigrette
recipe.cooking: In a saucepan, combine vinegar and cranberries. Cook over medium heat until cranberries soften. Remove from heat; add olive oil, sugar, salt and pepper. Place in blender and mix until smooth. Refrigerate until chilled.
Core and julienne one pear, core and dice the other.
In a large bowl, combine the Romaine lettuce, endive, diced pears, walnuts and Gorgonzola. Toss and drizzle with enough dressing to coat.
Divide among salad plates and garnish with julienned pear. Top with any additional walnuts as well.

recipe.name: Grilled Tuscan Rib Steak
recipe.cooking: Mix the spices together in a small bowl. Rub the steaks lightly with olive oil and sprinkle both sides with the spice rub.
Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Place the steaks on the grill and cook 5 to 7 minutes per side, depending on how well done you like your steak.
Let the steak rest for at least 15 minutes, then slice across grain into thick slices.

recipe.name: White Bean Chicken Chili
recipe.cooking: Heat oil, and cook onion and garlic until soft.
Stir in broth, tomatillos, tomatoes, chilies, and spices. Bring to a boil, then simmer for 10 minutes.
Add corn, chicken, and beans; simmer 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
